popAndSeperate(MailCardsStack, DealCardsStack) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.AllCardsStack
Applicative Transformer:
removes the cards from the current stack and place them into MailCardsStack or DealCardsStack depending on their card type Precondition:
AllCardsStack must contain elements(cards) Postcondition:
cards are seperated into 2 different stacks and AllCardsStack should be empty

positionSuffle(Position[]) - Static method in class mvc.controller.Controller
Transformer:
Suffles the positions into the table Precondition:
The Array argument must contain all it's elements(positions) Postcondition:
Suffles the positions into the Array, except the Starting Position(0) and the PayDay Position(31)
